LanguageData.MpWrongMultiplayerVersionInfo: The server is hosted on Multiplayer {0} (protocol {1}).
LanguageData.MpWrongDefsInfo: Make sure your installed mods, their versions and order match the host's.
LanguageData.MpWrongModConfigsInfo: Your mod configs differ from the host's, sync them for best results.
LanguageData.MpSyncModConfigsDesc: Forces clients to download the same mod configs as the host; reduces desyncs
LanguageData.MpChangeUsernameInfo: You can change your username in the mod settings.
LanguageData.MpReplayOutdatedDesc1: This replay was made for protocol version {0}, but you are running version {1}.
LanguageData.MpReplayOutdatedDesc2: The replay might not play correctly.
LanguageData.MpReplayOutdatedDesc3: Possible incompatibilities are listed with the release history.
LanguageData.MpReplayOutdatedDesc4: This file contains additional information and hosting from it should work fine.
LanguageData.MpServerCloseConfirmation: Are you sure you want to close the server? Unsaved progress will be lost.
LanguageData.MpFullSaveDesc: Full saves load faster, but save slower, and are only available to the Host
LanguageData.MpAutoAcceptSteamDesc: Automatically accept any incoming Steam connection requests.
LanguageData.MpAutosaveSlotsDesc: How many autosave files to keep.
LanguageData.MpSteamConnectingTo: Connecting to a game hosted by {0}
LanguageData.MpLanDesc1: Broadcast the game to your local network.
LanguageData.MpArbiterDesc: A background game instance which helps with desync detection/solving. Running without Arbiter is unsupported.
LanguageData.MpAsyncTimeDesc: Separate time controls for each map and the planet.
LanguageData.MpLogDesyncTracesDesc: Log extra stacktraces for troubleshooting desyncs; may impact performance
LanguageData.MpNoSaves: Multiplayer can only be played from already existing saves
LanguageData.MpPauseAutosaveCounterDesc: Pauses the counter along with the game preventing autosaving while time is paused.
LanguageData.MpShowModCompatibilityDesc: Enables showing of [4] crowd-sourced compatibility scores in Mods manager
LanguageData.MpCallingFactionNotAvailable: Calling other factions is currently not available in multiplayer.
LanguageData.MpAggressiveTickingDesc: Always try to automatically catch up with the server at the cost of FPS.
